description: Smallest order for which there are n nonisomorphic finite Abelian groups, or 0 if no such order exists.
comments: There is a k: A000688(k)=n if and only if n is product of partition numbers.
links: B. Horvat, G. Jaklic and T. Pisanski, On the number of Hamiltonian groups
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Abelian Group.
Index entries for sequences related to enumerating groups.
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
